articles.title: Wu responds to Kraft’s decision to drop out of mayoral race
articles.description:
Mayor Michelle Wu thanked Josh Kraft in a statement. It is unclear if Kraft's name will still appear on the general election ballot.

The post Wu responds to Kraft’s decision to drop out of mayoral race appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mayor Michelle Wu thanked Josh Kraft for his decision to withdraw from the mayoral race.
Kraft's name may still appear on the general election ballot despite his withdrawal.
Wu's response indicates potential shifts in the mayoral race dynamics for Boston residents.

articles.title: So many spotted lanternflies are out right now, you can see it on radar
articles.description:
Many experts have recommended squishing them, but that’s a tall order when there are that many.

The post So many spotted lanternflies are out right now, you can see it on radar appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Experts recommend squishing spotted lanternflies due to their increasing population in Boston.
Radar shows a significant rise in lanternfly sightings across the region this September.
Residents may face challenges in controlling the invasive species affecting local ecosystems.

articles.title: Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian toured Salem
articles.description:
“He was very friendly and approachable. He was very nice.”

The post Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian toured Salem appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Travis Barker and Kourtney Kardashian visited Salem, enhancing local tourism interest.
The couple's visit attracted attention on September 12, boosting local businesses.
Their friendly demeanor encouraged positive interactions with residents and fans.

articles.title: Jerry Seinfeld compares ‘Free Palestine’ movement to KKK, report says
articles.description:
“Just say you don’t like Jews. By saying ‘Free Palestine,’ you’re not admitting what you really think."

The post Jerry Seinfeld compares ‘Free Palestine’ movement to KKK, report says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jerry Seinfeld criticized the 'Free Palestine' movement, equating it to the KKK.
Seinfeld's comments sparked local debates on anti-Semitism and free speech in Boston.
Community leaders are urging dialogue to address rising tensions in Boston's diverse neighborhoods.
